resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106116</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106116</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201854</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">In His/Her Shoes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In Seinen/ihr Schuhen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans des Ses Chaussures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em His/Her Sapatas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In Suoi Pattini</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στα παπούτσια του/της</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En Su Zapatos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will research the laws around tobacco of another part of the world and write a brief narrative from the perspective living in the environment created by those regulations.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kursteilnehmer erforschen die Gesetze um Tabak
eines anderen Teils der Welt und schreiben eine kurze Darstellung von 
der Perspektive lebend in die Umgebung, die durch jene Regelungen 
erstellt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants rechercheront les lois autour du 
tabac d'une autre partie du monde et écriront un bref récit de la 
perspective vivant dans l'environnement créé par ces règlements.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes pesquisarão as leis em torno do 
tabaco de uma outra parte do mundo e escreverão uma narrativa breve 
do perspective que vivem no ambiente criado por aqueles regulamentos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi ricercheranno le leggi intorno a 
tabacco di un'altra parte del mondo e scriveranno una breve 
descrizione dalla prospettiva che vivono nell'ambiente creato da 
quelle regolazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα ερευνήσουν τους νόμους γύρω από τον 
καπνό ενός άλλου μέρους του κόσμου και θα γράψουν ένα 
συνοπτικό αφήγημα από την προοπτική ζωντανός στο περιβάλλον που 
δημιουργείται από εκείνους τους κανονισμούς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes investigarán los leyes alrededor 
de tabaco de otra parte del mundo y escribirán una narrativa 
abreviada de la perspectiva que viven en el ambiente creado por esas 
regulaciones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201854</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Free to use or adapt for educational purposes only</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106116</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/in-his-her-shoes</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
